What's wrong, Sil?\""},{"lineNumber":99728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……申し訳ありません、ランス様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... I'm sorry, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":99729,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お肉を腐らせてしまいました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've let the meat spoil...\""},{"lineNumber":99730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーにィー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":99731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……やばげ色……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... it's a dangerous color...\""},{"lineNumber":99732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一日くらいなら平気だと思ったのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought it would be fine for about a day...\""},{"lineNumber":99733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、この辺は暑いからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, it's because it's hot around here.\""},{"lineNumber":99734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすん、捨てるしかなさそうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff, looks like we'll have no choice but to throw it away.\""},{"lineNumber":99735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":99736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら？　セラクロラス様？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Seracloras-sama?\""},{"lineNumber":99737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……てやぷー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Teyapuu.\""},{"lineNumber":99738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！　お肉が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya! The meat!?\""},{"lineNumber":99739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、新鮮な真っ赤な色合いに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, it's a fresh bright red color!\""},{"lineNumber":99740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時間……戻しといた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... turned back time...\""},{"lineNumber":99741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、時のセラクロラスの力ですね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's the power of Seracloras of Time!\""},{"lineNumber":99742,"originalJapaneseLine":"「心情的に微妙に食べづらいが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Emotionally, it's a bit hard to eat but...\""},{"lineNumber":99743,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、しかし良くやったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, but well done.\""},{"lineNumber":99744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":99745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いくら腐らせても、セラクロラス様が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No matter how much it spoils, if Seracloras-sama is here,"},{"lineNumber":99746,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いらっしゃれば安心ですねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel at ease.\""},{"lineNumber":99747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これだけの力があるのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though you have such power,"},{"lineNumber":99748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やることがみみっちい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"the things you choose to do are petty...\""},{"lineNumber":99749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなにすごい力は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With such incredible power,"},{"lineNumber":99750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと有意義なことに使うべきだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"you should use it for something more meaningful."},{"lineNumber":99751,"originalJapaneseLine":"　例えば――」","translatedEnglishLine":"For example—\""},{"lineNumber":99752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":99753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「着古した服を若返らせたり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Like rejuvenating worn-out clothes.\""},{"lineNumber":99754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":99755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、何か言いたげだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, you look like you want to say something.\""},{"lineNumber":99756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ、いたた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch, ow...\""},{"lineNumber":99757,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すす、すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"S-s-sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":99758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":99759,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなく、セラクロラスは嬉しそうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, Seracloras looked happy."},{"lineNumber":99760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":99761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コパンドン？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Copandon?\""},{"lineNumber":99762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、あかん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's no good...\""},{"lineNumber":99763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あかんねん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's no good..."},{"lineNumber":99764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああいうのに頼ると","translatedEnglishLine":"If you rely on things like that,"},{"lineNumber":99765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後で手痛いしっぺ返しが来んねん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you get a painful backlash later...\""},{"lineNumber":99766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウチ、知ってんねん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I know that..."},{"lineNumber":99767,"originalJapaneseLine":"　知ってんねんで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I really do...\""},{"lineNumber":99768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ……ぶつぶつと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What... mumbling to yourself...?\""},{"lineNumber":99769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すやすや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sleeping soundly...\""},{"lineNumber":99770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あわわ、ら、ランス様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, awawa, L-Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":99771,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁん？　そんなに慌ててなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Why are you in such a hurry?\""},{"lineNumber":99772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":99773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まさか……お前までガキが出来たとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no way... even you have a kid...?\""},{"lineNumber":99774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち、違います！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, that's not it!\""},{"lineNumber":99775,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが、その、大変なんです……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's just that, well, it's serious...\""},{"lineNumber":99776,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、あの、いらして下さい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, um, please come with me...\""},{"lineNumber":99777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだぁ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":99778,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルに手を引かれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Being pulled by Sil's hand,"},{"lineNumber":99779,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが自分の部屋に戻る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance returned to his own room."},{"lineNumber":99780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you don't like it, move away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う……申し訳ありません、ランス様。
お肉を腐らせてしまいました……」
「一日くらいなら平気だと思ったのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought it would be fine for about a day..."
"Tch, it's because it's hot around here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすん、捨てるしかなさそうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sniff, looks like we'll have no choice but to throw it away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、新鮮な真っ赤な色合いに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it's a fresh bright red color!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、時のセラクロラスの力ですね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's the power of Seracloras of Time!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「心情的に微妙に食べづらいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Emotionally, it's a bit hard to eat but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、しかし良くやったぞ」
「いくら腐らせても、セラクロラス様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how much it spoils, if Seracloras-sama is here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらっしゃれば安心ですねぇ」
やることがみみっちい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the things you choose to do are petty..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと有意義なことに使うべきだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you should use it for something more meaningful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「着古した服を若返らせたり」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, you look like you want to say something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、セラクロラスは嬉しそうだった。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you rely on things like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後で手痛いしっぺ返しが来んねん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you get a painful backlash later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁん？　そんなに慌ててなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Why are you in such a hurry?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、まさか……お前までガキが出来たとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no way... even you have a kid...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あの、いらして下さい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, um, please come with me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが自分の部屋に戻る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance returned to his own room.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you don't like it, move away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う……申し訳ありません、ランス様。
お肉を腐らせてしまいました……」
「一日くらいなら平気だと思ったのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought it would be fine for about a day..."
"Tch, it's because it's hot around here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすん、捨てるしかなさそうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sniff, looks like we'll have no choice but to throw it away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、新鮮な真っ赤な色合いに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it's a fresh bright red color!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、時のセラクロラスの力ですね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's the power of Seracloras of Time!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「心情的に微妙に食べづらいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Emotionally, it's a bit hard to eat but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、しかし良くやったぞ」
「いくら腐らせても、セラクロラス様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how much it spoils, if Seracloras-sama is here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらっしゃれば安心ですねぇ」
やることがみみっちい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the things you choose to do are petty..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと有意義なことに使うべきだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you should use it for something more meaningful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「着古した服を若返らせたり」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, you look like you want to say something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、セラクロラスは嬉しそうだった。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you rely on things like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後で手痛いしっぺ返しが来んねん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you get a painful backlash later..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁん？　そんなに慌ててなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Why are you in such a hurry?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、まさか……お前までガキが出来たとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no way... even you have a kid...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あの、いらして下さい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, um, please come with me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが自分の部屋に戻る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance returned to his own room.
